get.summary: Get all customers for the authenticated user's companies

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of customers to return per page (default: 10)

message.example: An unexpected error occurred while retrieving customers.

marketing_opt_in_at.description: Datetime when the customer opted in to marketing. Null if not opted in.

send_self_service_email.description: Send the customer a notification with the self-service page URL

get.summary: Get a specific customer by ID

marketing_opt_in_at.description: Datetime when the customer opted in to marketing. Null if not opted in.

post.summary: Send self-service email to a customer
post.description: Sends a self-service email to a customer. The request is rate-limited to once every 2 minutes per user/customer pair.

422.description: Customer does not have an email address

message.example: Customer does not have an email address.
You can only send the self-service email once every 2 minutes.
An error occurred while sending the self-service email.

get.summary: Get all number ranges for the authenticated user's companies

message.example: A signup page for this company and number range already exists.

get.summary: Get sign-up customers for a specific date
get.description: Returns a paginated list of customers who registered via the specified sign-up page on a given date.

message.example: The given Sign-up ID not found.

sanctum.description: Enter your JWT token in the format 'Bearer <token>'
